name: Yuba 'Pappardelle'
keywords: appetizer, milk, olive oil, yuba, summer
recipeIngredient: 3 sheets yuba, cut into strips about 1 1/4 inches wide

recipeInstructions.text: Bring a large saucepan of lightly salted water to a boil. Add the yuba and cook for 1 minute. Turn off the heat and allow to rest for 2 minutes.
Drain the yuba and return to the pot. Add the milk and olive oil and season to taste with salt and pepper. Divide among four plates and serve.
